cu.explanation_en: Setting Num_Threads_PUSCH to a negative value will cause thread allocation errors and prevent the CU from initializing properly.

du.explanation_en: Setting maxMIMO_layers to 0 will disable MIMO functionality and cause connection issues during cell setup.
du.explanation_zh: 將 maxMIMO_layers 設定為 0 會停用 MIMO 功能，並在小區設定期間造成連接問題。
